roleset.name: legal transaction

example.name: All args
example.text: They ordered Schwarzenegger to implement it pending the resolution of his appeal of the case to the Supreme Court.

roleset.note: Roleset based on verb frame appeal.01

roleset.name: beg

example.name: appeal to and for
example.text: Recently, her appeal to the King for clemency, which has been heard even though she was arrested more than a year after Sandra Gregory, resulted in her sentence being reduced to 10 years.
example.arg: which has been heard even though she was arrested more than a year after Sandra Gregory

roleset.note: Roleset based on verb frame appeal.02.

roleset.name: be attractive

example.name: find attractive
example.text: His smile was part of his appeal to her.

roleset.note: Roleset based on verb appeal.03. Member of Vncls appeal: appeal-31.4-3.
